item.title: Huge cluster of potholes on avenall road junction, 13th February
item.description:
The stop cock location is completely submerged as in the photo. This has been an ongoing issue for a few years now and needs to be sorted as it's causing damage to vehicles.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Old Bath Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
